title: Why Life Insurance is Essential in 2025
details: Life insurance provides financial security to your family. Learn why now is the best time to get covered.
fullDetails: Life insurance protects your loved ones by ensuring they have financial support after your passing. It's a smart investment for long-term peace of mind.
author: Masud Parvaz

title: Term vs Whole Life Insurance: What to Choose?
details: Understand the difference between term and whole life insurance so you can make the best choice for your family.
fullDetails: Term insurance offers coverage for a limited time at a lower cost, while whole life insurance provides lifelong protection and a cash value component.
author: Sarah Ahmed

title: Top 5 Reasons to Get Life Insurance Before 30
details: Buying insurance early locks in lower premiums and secures your financial future.
fullDetails: Younger individuals benefit from lower premiums, fewer health concerns, and longer-term security. Discover why early coverage is a game-changer.
author: Reza Khan

title: How to Choose the Right Life Insurance Plan
details: Struggling to pick the right plan? Here's a step-by-step guide to help you decide.
fullDetails: Assess your budget, family needs, and financial goals to choose between term, whole, or universal insurance plans effectively.
author: Fatima Noor

title: Does Life Insurance Cover Critical Illness?
details: Learn whether your policy protects you in case of cancer, stroke, or heart attack.
fullDetails: Many modern policies include critical illness riders. Understand the terms and what diseases are covered before you commit.
author: Dr. Asif Rahman

title: Top Life Insurance Myths Debunked
details: Think life insurance is too expensive or only for old people? Think again.
fullDetails: From affordability to eligibility, we bust the biggest myths preventing people from getting covered in time.
author: Tania Islam

title: How Smoking Affects Your Life Insurance Premium
details: Smokers often pay more for insurance. Here’s how much and why.
fullDetails: Life insurers view smokers as higher risk. You could pay up to 50% more in premiums. Quitting can reduce your cost over time.
author: Nashid Anwar

title: Life Insurance for Stay-at-Home Parents
details: Even if you’re not earning, your work at home has huge value. Protect it.
fullDetails: Stay-at-home parents provide childcare, housework, and emotional support. Their loss can cost families dearly. Life insurance can provide a safety net.
author: Lubna Rahim

title: Understanding Riders in Life Insurance Policies
details: Riders enhance your base policy. Find out which ones are worth it.
fullDetails: Common riders include accidental death, critical illness, premium waiver, and income benefits. Know which fits your needs best.
author: Sajib Hossain

title: How to File a Life Insurance Claim
details: Filing a claim should be simple. Here’s a clear process to follow.
fullDetails: Notify the insurer, submit the required documents, and follow up. Learn the dos and don'ts to avoid rejection.
author: Amena Sultana

title: How Much Life Insurance Do You Need?
details: Avoid overpaying or underinsuring. Use this formula to find your ideal coverage.
fullDetails: A common method: 10x your annual income + debts + children's education. Tailor it based on your needs.
author: Farhan Kabir

title: Can You Change Life Insurance Beneficiaries?
details: Yes, but with conditions. Here’s how and when to update your beneficiaries.
fullDetails: Most policies allow you to update beneficiaries at any time. Legal and spousal restrictions may apply.
author: Tariq Hasan

title: What Happens If You Miss a Premium Payment?
details: Missed a payment? Don’t panic. You may still be covered.
fullDetails: Most policies offer a grace period (15–30 days). After that, your policy may lapse. You can often reinstate with a late fee.
author: Sumaiya Akter

title: Is Life Insurance Taxable in Bangladesh?
details: Know the tax rules so you or your heirs don’t lose out.
fullDetails: In most cases, payouts are tax-free. But certain investment-linked policies may have exceptions. Consult a tax advisor.
author: Mohammad Faisal

title: Top Life Insurance Providers in Bangladesh (2025)
details: Explore the top-rated insurers based on service, claim ratio, and premium value.
fullDetails: LIC Bangladesh, MetLife, Jiban Bima Corporation, and Pragati Life lead the market. Learn their pros and cons.
author: Nusrat Jahan

title: Can You Have Multiple Life Insurance Policies?
details: Yes, but be aware of the pros, cons, and legal implications.
fullDetails: Multiple policies can boost coverage, but claims must be transparent. Don’t exceed your insurability limit.
author: Shuvo Rahman

title: Life Insurance for Self-Employed People
details: Freelancers and business owners need protection too. Here’s how to plan it.
fullDetails: Without employer benefits, self-employed people must secure their own coverage. Choose flexible, income-based policies.
author: Sadia Mehzabin

title: Universal Life Insurance: A Smart Long-Term Choice?
details: Universal life combines protection with investment. But is it right for you?
fullDetails: Universal life policies allow premium flexibility and cash value growth. Ideal for long-term wealth planning.
author: Iftekhar Ahmed

title: Why Life Insurance Premiums Rise with Age
details: The older you are, the more you’ll pay. Here’s why age matters.
fullDetails: With age, health risks increase, raising your insurance premium. Buying young saves money in the long run.
author: Samin Mahmud

title: Tips for Saving on Life Insurance
details: Looking to save money while staying protected? Try these tips.
fullDetails: Compare policies, avoid unnecessary riders, maintain a healthy lifestyle, and buy early. These steps can significantly cut your premium.
